title: Cyberpunk Neko Glitch
style: Cyberpunk, glitch art, futuristic, slightly distressed
colorScheme: Neon pink, electric blue, dark gray/black
targetAudience: Tech enthusiasts, cyberpunk fans, anime lovers, anyone who appreciates unique and edgy designs
designElements: A Maneki Neko (lucky cat) rendered in a low-poly, pixelated style. The cat is partially glitched out, with digital noise and distorted textures. Use neon colors for the glitch effects and outlines. Background is a dark gradient with circuit board patterns faintly visible.
mood: Edgy, futuristic, chaotic but also cool and stylish
aiPrompt: Generate an image for a T-shirt design: A Maneki Neko (lucky cat) in a low-poly pixel art style. Cat should be glitching with neon pink and electric blue digital noise, creating a distorted and fragmented look. The background is a dark gray gradient with faint circuit board patterns. The overall style is cyberpunk with a glitch art aesthetic. The cat should be waving. Keep the cat design simple.

originalAnalysis.targetAudience: Fans of Japanese culture, streetwear enthusiasts, cat lovers

title: Cyberpunk Skull Circuit
theme: Cyberpunk/futuristic technology with a skull motif
targetAudience: Tech enthusiasts, gamers, fans of cyberpunk culture, young adults interested in unique and edgy designs.
designElements: A stylized skull made of circuit board patterns, glowing neon green lines highlighting key features of the skull (eyes, nose, teeth), scattered binary code elements, glitch effects.
mood: Futuristic, edgy, technologically advanced, slightly ominous
aiPrompt: Create a graphic T-shirt design. A stylized skull is formed from intricate circuit board patterns. Key features of the skull like the eyes, nose and teeth are emphasized with glowing neon green lines. The background is black with subtle dark grey circuit patterns and scattered binary code elements. Add a subtle glitch effect around the edges. Cyberpunk style, high-tech aesthetic.

originalAnalysis.style: Edgy, urban, minimalist with a gothic touch
originalAnalysis.targetAudience: Teenagers and young adults interested in alternative fashion, gothic styles, and music.

title: Cosmic Bloom
colorScheme: Deep blues, purples, pinks with hints of gold and white for highlights
targetAudience: Sci-fi enthusiasts, dreamers, people who appreciate the beauty of the universe, space lovers
designElements: Swirling nebula clouds, clusters of stars, shimmering cosmic dust, abstract representation of a supernova
aiPrompt: Create a surreal, vibrant image of a nebula formation in deep space. Use deep blues, purples, and pinks as dominant colors. Include swirling clouds of gas and dust, clusters of shimmering stars, and subtle golden highlights to represent cosmic dust. The composition should be dynamic and evoke a sense of vastness and wonder. The style should be dreamy and painterly, with soft edges and a touch of surrealism.

originalAnalysis.theme: Oil and water mixture creating colorful bubbles and organic shapes
originalAnalysis.targetAudience: People interested in science, abstract art, or vibrant designs; could appeal to a younger demographic due to the bright colors.
originalAnalysis.technique: Macro photography of oil droplets in water.

title: Checked Out
theme: Travel and escapism with a touch of melancholy
style: Vintage travel poster meets minimalist design
colorScheme: Off-white/cream for the shirt, faded teal and burnt orange for the design elements, black for text outlines.
targetAudience: Travel lovers, people who appreciate vintage aesthetics, introverts
designElements: A simplified, worn-looking vintage hotel key tag graphic with the text "Checked Out" replacing the usual room number. A faint, stylized world map in the background. Distressed textures.
aiPrompt: Create a vintage-style t-shirt design. The shirt color is off-white. The design features a simplified graphic of a vintage hotel key tag with the text "Checked Out" in a serif font. Behind the key tag is a faint, stylized world map with distressed textures. The color palette is faded teal and burnt orange with black text outlines. The overall style is reminiscent of a faded travel poster, with a touch of minimalist design. Focus on texture and subtle color variations to evoke a sense of nostalgia and wear.

title: Alpine Ascent
targetAudience: Art lovers, minimalist design fans, outdoor adventure seekers with an appreciation for modern art
designElements: A stylized geometric mountain range with sharp lines and layered triangular shapes. A small sun or star symbol positioned above the highest peak. Use of negative space to suggest depth and vastness.
aiPrompt: Create a minimalist geometric design of a mountain range. Use sharp, layered triangular shapes in shades of green (#2C6037) and blue (#77A1B3). The background should be white. A small, stylized golden star (#F0E68C) should be placed above the highest peak. Use negative space to create depth and a sense of vastness. The style should be similar to a modern geometric poster design.

originalAnalysis.targetAudience: Outdoor enthusiasts, hikers, nature lovers, travelers

title: Retro Space Explorer Club
colorScheme: Navy blue, orange, white, with accents of retro teal and muted gold.
targetAudience: Space enthusiasts, retro lovers, anyone who enjoys a touch of nostalgia
designElements: A stylized astronaut wearing a vintage space helmet, a retro rocket ship, and a stylized planet with rings. Text 'Space Explorer Club' in a retro font.
aiPrompt: Create a retro-style T-shirt design featuring an astronaut with a vintage space helmet and a retro rocket ship orbiting a stylized planet. Use navy blue, orange, white, teal and gold colors. The text 'Space Explorer Club' should be incorporated using a retro-style font. The design should evoke a feeling of adventure and nostalgia, reminiscent of vintage space travel posters. The astronaut and rocket should have a slightly worn, vintage look, as if they are from an old comic book.

originalAnalysis.style: Varied, ranging from cartoonish and playful to retro and simple typography
originalAnalysis.technique: Combination of graphic design, typography, and illustration

title: Cosmic Champions
theme: Space exploration team with vintage sporting elements
style: Retro futurism, blending classic sports imagery with space travel aesthetics.
targetAudience: Science enthusiasts, sports fans, retro design lovers, individuals interested in space exploration, people who like unique T-shirts.
designElements: A stylized rocket taking off (or landing) instead of a person throwing/kicking a ball, with the words "Cosmic Champions" in a vintage sports font. Stars and planets forming team uniforms. A retro-futuristic badge shape with a space team logo.
aiPrompt: Generate a vintage-style sports t-shirt design. The primary image is a rocket taking off, rendered in a retro-futuristic style, replacing a basketball player. The text "Cosmic Champions" is arched above the rocket in a distressed, varsity font. The background features stylized stars and planets. Use a color palette of navy blue, electric blue, silver, and red accents. The overall aesthetic should be reminiscent of 1950s sci-fi movie posters combined with collegiate sportswear.

originalAnalysis.theme: Team spirit, University pride, Event commemoration
originalAnalysis.targetAudience: Students, alumni, sports fans, local community
originalAnalysis.technique: Screen printing or direct-to-garment printing with a slightly distressed effect.

title: Growth Mindset Bloom
style: Modern, minimalist with a touch of organic/nature-inspired design
colorScheme: Earthy tones (sage green, beige, terracotta) with a pop of vibrant floral color (e.g., a coral or deep purple).
targetAudience: Young adults, entrepreneurs, creatives, and anyone interested in self-development.
designElements: The phrase 'Bloom Where You Are Planted' arranged in a visually appealing layout. Incorporate a subtle botanical illustration, such as stylized wildflowers or leaves, that appear to be growing around or within the text. The font should be a combination of a clean sans-serif and a slightly script-like font to add personality.
aiPrompt: Create a T-shirt design featuring the phrase 'Bloom Where You Are Planted' in a modern minimalist style. Use earthy tones such as sage green, beige, and terracotta. Incorporate stylized, delicate wildflowers and leaves growing subtly around the text. The text should be a combination of a clean sans-serif font for 'Bloom Where You Are' and a slightly flowing script font for 'Planted'. The overall composition should be balanced and visually appealing, evoking a sense of growth, hope, and resilience. Soft lighting and a slightly textured background.

originalAnalysis.targetAudience: Individuals seeking inspiration, self-improvement, or positive reinforcement, potentially students or young professionals.
originalAnalysis.technique: Text-based design with decorative elements, layering of text, and possibly vectorized elements.

title: Cosmic Coffee Crew
colorScheme: Deep blues, purples, and oranges with cream accents
targetAudience: Coffee lovers, astronomy enthusiasts, quirky individuals
designElements: A vintage-style spaceship shaped like a coffee mug surrounded by stars and planets, with text 'Cosmic Coffee Crew' and a year.
aiPrompt: Create a vintage-style T-shirt design. The central image is a cartoon spaceship shaped like a coffee mug, with steam rising from the top like rocket exhaust. The spaceship is surrounded by colorful cartoon planets, stars, and a crescent moon. The color palette should be deep blues, purples, oranges, and cream. Text should read 'Cosmic Coffee Crew' in a retro font above the spaceship, and '2024' below in a smaller, sans-serif font. Style should be illustrative and slightly psychedelic with a distressed texture.

originalAnalysis.theme: School spirit, team pride, group affiliation

title: Cyber Bloom
targetAudience: Gamers, tech enthusiasts, those interested in cyberpunk fashion
designElements: Stylized glowing neon green floral patterns (e.g., orchids, lilies) arranged in a geometric grid pattern overlaid on a dark blue/black background. Subtle circuit board details integrated within the floral design. Glitching/pixelated edges on some floral elements.
aiPrompt: Create a T-shirt design with a cyberpunk theme. The background should be a dark blue to black gradient. Overlay a geometric grid pattern with stylized neon green floral elements like orchids and lilies. Integrate subtle circuit board patterns within the floral design. Add glitching and pixelation effects to the edges of some flowers. The overall style should be vibrant, futuristic, and slightly edgy. Render in high detail.

originalAnalysis.targetAudience: Athletes, sports enthusiasts, people who like modern abstract designs
